name: Xavier And The Egg Collecting Chronicles
name_original: Xavier And The Egg Collecting Chronicles
description:
A sequel to the hit game Xavier. In this egg collecting adventure, Xavier is presented with a new platforming level to complete and collect an egg. After you collect your egg for the day, come back tomorrow for a new egg. Each day has 5 eggs to collect each with different rarities. Didn't get the egg you want one day? Try again next week!

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move. 

Space to Jump.

Esc to return to the main menu.
